instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
I have one of these with flexgates powers up fine. I repaired cable and reassembled . Now it only gets to 200ma - 300ma , cpu gets warm no chime . touchpad vibrates but keyboard light does not come on. I have removed the backlight cable but still the same. I also tried test screen but still same.
Any help appreciated.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message: Did you test it disconnecting video cable (J8500)?

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
Inspect board for knocked off components, or broken trace.
Test it alone on the desk; check CPU voltage.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
I got the current to come back to 800ma then it drops 700ma/400ma black screen, chime can be heard. I tried with other screens still the same.
l7220/210 = 612mv
l7410 = 0v
l7430/420 = 0v
l7270 = 890mv

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
External video present?
Check it disconnecting J8500.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message: Im getting external now with J8500 connected or removed

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
Check if 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD come high in the first seconds at least (when chime).
If yes, DP_INT_HPD must go high at same time.
If not, check diode mode to ground on EDP_INT_ lines; w/ and w/o internal LCD connected.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message: With screen connected 3V3/5V_S0SW_LCD go high briefly but DP_INT_HPD does not .

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
"If not, check diode mode to ground on EDP_INT_ lines; w/ and w/o internal LCD connected."
???

Seems that LCD, or video cable issue; internal LCD isn't detected.
Did you change the small video cable?

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message: Apologies mean to say that EDP_INT_AUX_N is open when measured diode mode  but EDP_INT_AUX_P has .170 on diode mode. I changed the lcd cable and screen. Looks like CPU ?.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
threads.message:
Each pair lines must have similar reading.
If not, bad CPU, or broken trace.

threads.title: A1706 820-00239-A 300MA TO 400MA No Display No backlight.
